articles.title: Credentials of Representative of WHO Accepted
articles.content:
Credentials of Representative of WHO Accepted
 Pyongyang, January 8 (KCNA) -- Sarveshwar Puri, representative of the World Health Organization to the DPRK, presented his credentials to Pak Ui Chun, foreign minister of the DPRK, on Jan. 8.
					 After accepting the credentials, Pak had a talk with the representative.

articles.title: More Mass Rallies Held to Vow to Fulfill Militant Tasks for This Year
articles.content:
More Mass Rallies Held to Vow to Fulfill Militant Tasks for This Year
 Pyongyang, January 8 (KCNA) -- Mass rallies took place in South and North Phyongan, North Hwanghae and South Hamgyong provinces Wednesday to response to the letter of the employees of the Chollima Steel Complex and vow to thoroughly implement the militant tasks laid down in the joint New Year editorial in hearty.
					 Attending the rallies were leading officials of local party, power and economic organs and working people's organizations, people from all walks of life, youth and students. 
					
					 Read out there was the letter of the employees of the complex addressed to all other working people across the country.
					
					 Reporters and speakers at the mass rallies renewed their determination to translate the plan of the Workers' Party of Korea for building an economic power into reality with the will to carry through General Secretary Kim Jong Il's instructions in a do-or-die spirit, noting that to effect a great surge at present means a new general advance to put the national economy on the stage of leaping progress in the revolutionary soldier spirit and by dint of science and technology. 
					
					 They called upon the party members and other working people to keep pace with the forced march being conducted by Kim Jong Il and put spurs to the on-going all-out charge to glorify the honor of being victors. 
					
					 They underscored the need to proudly build a great prosperous powerful nation through a great revolutionary surge in the Songun era by carrying forward the tradition of the heroic generation who defended the party and the leader through the great Chollima upswing and built socialism.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il Lauded
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il Lauded 
 Pyongyang, January 8 (KCNA) -- Kenichi Ogami, secretary general of the International Institute of the Juche Idea, expressed profound reverence for President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary
					Kim Jong Il, when interviewed by KCNA on Jan. 6 while staying in the DPRK.
					 He said:
					
					The great revolutionary idea and noble virtues of the President who is always remembered by humankind serve as a great model of the progressive people struggling to build an independent new world.
					
					Kim Jong Il has enforced the unique Songun policy by carrying forward and developing the President's idea of attaching importance to the military affairs.
					
					Thanks to Kim Jong Il's Songun leadership the Korean people have firmly defended and glorified the ocialist country which the President handed down to them.
					
					 The DPRK has performed miracles and innovations, smashing the imperialists' moves for aggression as it is wisely led by Kim Jong Il.
					
					The militant spirit of the Korean people convinces the world progressive people desirous of independence that they are sure to emerge victorious when they struggle in single-minded unity, believing in their own strength. 
					
					The world progressives are watching Songun Korea vigorously advancing under the leadership of Kim Jong Il out of envy and greatly encouraged by the spirit of the people of the DPRK. 
					
					 Socialist Korea will prosper forever as it holds in high esteem Kim Jong Il successfully carrying the President's cause of the revolution to completion.

articles.title: World-startling Chollima Upsurge in 1950s
articles.content:
World-startling Chollima Upsurge in 1950s
 Pyongyang, January 8 (KCNA) -- Now the Korean people are all out in a general offensive to open the gate to a great, prosperous and powerful nation, holding high the militant slogan "Make the fullest development of Songun Korea by inheriting the great tradition of revolutionary upswing!" 
					 General Secretary Kim Jong Il kindled the torch of a new revolutionary upsurge while giving field guidance to the Chollima Steel Complex on December 24 last year to be recorded in the history of Songun Korea.
					
					 This is a remarkable event which will mark a new turning-point in the development of the Workers' Party of Korea and the revolution as President Kim Il Sung set the Chollima Movement in motion over 50 years ago.
					
					 The President convened a plenary meeting of the Central Committee of the WPK in December Juche 45 (1956) and called upon the whole Party and all the people to make a new upswing in the socialist construction with redoubled efforts.
					
					With that as a momentum the flame of Chollima upsurge furiously blazed in the DPRK, working world-startling miracles in all sectors of the national economy.
					
					 Under the revolutionary slogan "Charge at the speed of Chollima!" the Korean people took ten or hundred steps when others took one step and made continued innovation and uninterrupted advance, smashing all sorts of passivism, conservatism and mysticism about technology.
					
					 As a result, the Five-Year National Economic Plan (1957-1961) was overfulfilled within two and a half years in the terms of total industrial output value and within four years on all indices of products. The total industrial output value grew 3.5 times in the period from 1957 to 1960 and the average annual increase of industrial production showed 36.6 percent.
					
					 The Korean people built a self-supporting socialist industrial state in a short span of time with the stamina with which they had carried out the Five-Year National Economic Plan ahead of the set time.
					
					 The Korean people will fully demonstrate once again the might of heroic Korea in the efforts for accomplishing the cause of building a great, prosperous and powerful socialist country in the great Songun era in the spirit with which they had built a powerful nation independent in politics, self-supporting in the economy and self-reliant in defence, overcoming the grave difficulties through the Chollima upsurge in the 1950s.

articles.title: Political and Ideological Superiority of Revolutionary Army Mightier than Nuclear Weapons
articles.content:
Political and Ideological Superiority of Revolutionary Army Mightier than Nuclear Weapons
 Pyongyang, January 8 (KCNA) -- The Korean People's Army is displaying its might to the full today as a powerful army in ideas.
					 The political and ideological superiority of the revolutionary army is more powerful than nuclear weapons.
					
					 This means that it is a decisive factor on which depends the victory or defeat in a war.
					
					 The "doctrine of weapon almighty" was predominant in the past days, which meant that one would win in a war when possessed of superior arms and vice versa.
					
					 It is true that the weapon is important in a war. The decisive factor of victory or defeat, however, is not the weapon but the great political and ideological superiority of the army.
					
					 Any enemy, whatever military and technical advantages he may have,  finds himself on the losing end in face of an army possessed of such political and ideological superiority as noble revolutionary spirit of fighting for the freedom and liberation of the people, boundless loyalty to the Party and the leader, unparalleled self-sacrificing spirit and mass heroism readily laying down one's youth and life for the motherland and the revolution, revolutionary comradeship between officers and men, bonds of kinship with the people and conscious military discipline .
					
					 It was with superior political and ideological might that the revolutionary armed forces of Korea, under the leadership of President Kim Il Sung, beat the Japanese imperialists, the robbers armed to the teeth, and liberated the motherland, and won in the Fatherland Liberation War by knocking down the U.S. imperialists who boasted of being "the strongest" in the world.
					
					 The Korean People's Army will firmly defend the sovereignty of the DPRK, giving fuller scope to the political and ideological superiority, the ever-victorious weapon, true to the Songun politics of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: KCNA Blasts Lee Myung Bak Group's Anachronistic Confrontational Policy
articles.content:
KCNA Blasts Lee Myung Bak Group's Anachronistic Confrontational Policy
Pyongyang, January 8 (KCNA) -- The joint editorial of the newspapers of the Workers' Party of Korea, the Korean People's Army and the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League released on the occasion of the New Year warned against the south Korean ruling conservatives' policy for confrontation with fellow countrymen.
					 For less than one year since its seizure of power the Lee Myung Bak group has been hell-bent on inciting confrontation between the north and the south after totally denying the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration. It has thus laid a stumbling block in the way of the Koreans' movement for national reunification.
					
					 The above-said declarations are programmes for reunification common to the nation as they clarified the fundamental principle for developing the north-south relations and ways for doing so.
					
					 Recently the south Korean rulers talked about "dialogue," claiming that "they have never denied them" for fear that they may be held accountable for the bedeviled north-south relations.
					
					 The Lee group has committed too hideous crimes to redress them with a few words of excuses. 
					
					 No sooner had the conservative Lee Myung Bak regime come to power in south Korea than the cooperation projects for national reconciliation, unity and reunification, which had been brisk in all fields including politics, economy, military affairs and culture and the inter-Korean relations, which had favorably developed, were brought to suspension overnight.
					
					 The farce for "total reexamination of the policy toward the north" was staged and the story about "the lost decade" and the theory of "preemptive strike" designating fellow countrymen as "principal enemy" were openly advocated. 
					
					It was none other than the Lee group which took part in co-sponsoring the "resolution on the human rights issue in north Korea" aimed at doing harm to fellow countrymen on the international arena and begged the U.S. not to delist the DPRK as a "state sponsor of terrorism."
					
					 It is due to this group that the north-south relations have been brought back to those before the publication of the June 15 joint declaration at present and the nationwide reunification movement that had advanced under the banner of "By our nation itself" is facing a stern trial.
					
					 With nothing can the Lee group redeem the huge crimes it has committed against the nation.
					
					 The group is now jabbering that "it is now willing to properly start the south-north relations, though it is hard to do so, in order to have solid ones." This is aimed to evade punishment by history as it is nothing but shameless nonsense.
					
					 The June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration serve as groundwork for developing the north-south relations. Even the slightest improvement of the above-said relations is unthinkable unless there is a proper stand and attitude toward them.
					
					 It is quite illogical to talk about "the improvement of the relations" without adhering to the fundamental principle.
					
					 How ridiculous it is to trumpet about "dialogue" while hiding a dagger behind one's belt.
					
					 Such form of "dialogue" would produce nothing constructive.
					
					 It is because such nonsense was talked by those who stood against national harmony and scuttled the dialogue themselves.
					
					 Their rhetoric about "dialogue" and "cooperation" is little short of putting up a precondition for renewed campaign for confrontation with the DPRK. It is clearly evidenced by their grumbling that the DPRK is not responding with "sincerity" to their call for "dialogue" and "cooperation."
					
					 The south Korean authorities' anachronistic confrontational policy is facing total bankruptcy and the anti-reunification forces are being driven into a tight corner.
					
					 The Lee regime's political gambling on which it stakes the fate of the nation has touched off censure not only among the Koreans at home and abroad but of the international community.
					
					 The group is trying to find a way out of its political crisis in the so-called "improved policy toward the north" but it will get the group nowhere. 
					
					 With nothing can the group of traitors evade the responsibility for having thrown a stumbling block in the way of national reconciliation, unity and reunification.
					
					 The desire and wishes of the fellow countrymen can never become a plaything of the political philistines who have turned their backs on the nation.

articles.title: All Koreans Called upon to Frustrate War Moves of Aggressor Forces
articles.content:
All Koreans Called upon to Frustrate War Moves of Aggressor Forces
 Pyongyang, January 8 (KCNA) -- All the Koreans at home and abroad should dynamically wage the nationwide struggle to frustrate the reckless moves stepped up by the bellicose forces at home and abroad to threaten the peace of the country and push the military tension on the Korean Peninsula to an extreme phase, obsessed with the wild ambition to invade the north.
					 Rodong Sinmun today says this in a signed article.
					
					 Citing facts to prove that peace of the Korean Peninsula last year was seriously threatened by the reckless confrontation and war moves of the U.S. and south Korean warmongers and the situation always remains so tense on the peninsula that a war may break out any moment, the article goes on:
					
					 The reality eloquently proves that the Korean nation can achieve neither durable peace of the Korean Peninsula nor the independent reunification, peace and prosperity of the country unless an end is put to the U.S. military presence in south Korea and moves for a war of aggression against the DPRK and the confrontation with it escalated by the Lee Myung Bak group, pursuant to outsiders' hostile policy towards it.
					
					 The reunification movement organizations and people from all walks of life at home and abroad should closely unite under the banner of peace against war to condemn every joint military exercise for aggression and arms build-up of the U.S. and disclose its criminal aim and frustrate it through joint actions. 
					
					 All the fellow countrymen should decisively foil the confrontation and war rackets of the puppet warmongers, bearing in mind the truth that the independent reunification, peace and prosperity of the country can be achieved only through a patriotic struggle against the maneuvers of the Lee Myung Bak group for provoking a war of aggression against the DPRK.
					
					 The puppet warmongers would be well advised to behave themselves, bearing in mind that their reckless moves to start a war of aggression against the DPRK in collusion with outside forces is as foolish an act as jumping into fire with faggots on their back.
					
					 With no desperate moves to ignite the above-said war can the U.S. and south Korean bellicose forces break the will of the Korean nation to achieve independent reunification, peace and prosperity of the country.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on Complicated Mideast Situation
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on Complicated Mideast Situation
 Pyongyang, January 8 (KCNA) -- Many shocking incidents not be overlooked by the international community happened in Mideast countries such as Iraq, Afghanistan, Iran, Syria, Pakistan and Palestine last year due to the deep interference of the United States in the region. 
					 Rodong Sinmun Thursday says this in a signed article. 
					
					Citing facts to prove that such incidents took place in the above-said countries due to U.S. aggression and interference last year, the article goes on:
					
					 The Mideast situation last year proves that in order to defend the sovereignty of each country and nation and peace of the region it is necessary for them to build up their own strength and achieve unity and solidarity in the struggle to contain the U.S. imperialists and their allies and isolate and weaken them. 
					
					 This also clearly testifies once again to the fact that the U.S. policy of aggression and interference is the root cause of all misfortune and disasters and the U. S. imperialists are the incarnation of all evils.
					
					 The article stresses the need to enhance the spirit of independence against imperialism and working class consciousness and fight against the aggression forces to the end with strong mental power. 
					
					 All the people of the world desirous of independence should direct the spearhead of the struggle for independence against imperialism and for peace to the U.S. imperialists and exert all efforts for checking and frustrating their high-handed and hegemonic policy, the article notes, emphasizing that the struggle of the peoples in the region to frustrate the U.S. aggressive strategy toward the Mideast and achieve peace and stability of the region is sure to triumph.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak's Unpopular Policy Flayed in S. Korea
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak's Unpopular Policy Flayed in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, January 8 (KCNA) -- According to KBS of south Korea, over 100 personages from different strata held a press conference in Seoul on Jan. 5 to denounce the traitorous Lee Myung Bak group's unpopular policy.
					The participants charged that the Lee Myung Bak "government" has aggravated the disunion of society by pursuing the policy only for the sake of the rich and the privileged class for the past one year.
					
					 The "government" seeks to override the public service of media by leaving broadcasting in hands of the businesses and the conservative newspapers, they deplored.
					
					 They urged the "government" to give attention to the voice of the people and shape policies for them.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Regime's Undemocratic Action Assailed in S. Korea
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Regime's Undemocratic Action Assailed in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, January 8 (KCNA) -- Members of the Democratic Labor Party of south Korea held a press conference in Seoul on Jan. 5 at which they railed against the puppet authorities' undemocratic action, according to CBS of south Korea.
					 At the conference they recalled that 18 members of the party who had been on a sit-in strike at the "National Assembly" in protest against the moves to railroad the evil bills through it were rounded up by the police at dawn of the same day.
					
					 They charged that such undemocratic action taken by the Lee Myung Bak regime at the NA is little short of proclaiming a "martial law" against the people, urging the "government" to release the illegally arrested party members without delay.

articles.title: Significant Anniversaries of DPRK Marked
articles.content:
Significant Anniversaries of DPRK Marked
Pyongyang, January 8 (KCNA) -- The Russian Youth Association for the Study of the Juche Idea and the Finland-Korea Society held meetings on Dec. 20 last year on the occasions of the 17th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's assumption of supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army and the 91st birth anniversary of anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk.
					Speeches were made at the meetings.
					
					Dmitri Kostenko, chairman of the Russian association, stressed that Supreme Commander of the KPA Kim Jong Il has displayed his extraordinary talent as an outstanding strategist.
					
					The KPA under his Songun leadership has grown to be an army strong in ideology, which regards the Juche idea and the spirit of devotedly defending the leader as its unshakable faith, and an invincible army capable of defeating any formidable enemy at one blow, he added.
					
					Daria Matsina, a member of the Russian Women's Union Named after Kim Jong Suk, said that
						Kim Jong Suk is not only the most faithful comrade-in-arms of President Kim Il Sung but also the great mother who gave birth to and brought up Kim Jong Il as the sun of future.
					
					Esko Koskinen, chairperson of the above-mentioned Finnish society, said that the DPRK led by
						Kim Jong Il, supreme commander of the KPA, is victoriously advancing despite the imperialists' moves to stifle it.
					
					All the achievements made in the DPRK are the precious fruition of the single-minded unity of the army and people around Kim Jong Il, the chairperson said, stressing that rosy is the future of the DPRK which is led by the peerlessly great man and where the party, the army and the people are united as one in mind.
					
					A congratulatory message to Kim Jong Il was adopted at the meeting held in Russia.

articles.title: February Holiday to Be Celebrated in Switzerland
articles.content:
February Holiday to Be Celebrated in Switzerland
Pyongyang, January 8 (KCNA) -- The Swiss preparatory committee to celebrate February 16, the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il, was inaugurated in Basel on January 1.
					Martin Lotscher, chairman of the Switzerland-Korea Committee, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					The preparatory committee set the celebration period from January 1 to February 17 and decided to widely introduce the undying feats and revolutionary activities of Kim Jong Il through media and hold colorful political and cultural events in the period.

articles.title: Efforts for Korea's Reunification Supported
articles.content:
Efforts for Korea's Reunification Supported
Pyongyang, January 8 (KCNA) -- Harising Khang, member of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of India (Marxist), released a statement on Jan. 2 in support of the joint New Year editorial issued by newspapers of the party, the army and the youth league in the DPRK.
					 In the statement he extended full support to the Workers' Party of Korea and the Korean people in the efforts to achieve the country's reunification under the slogan "Advance dynamically along the road of independent reunification under the banner of the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration!"
					
					 It is the unanimous desire of all the Korean people and the supreme task of the Korean nation to achieve the country's reunification independently and peacefully at an earlier date, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 We maintain that the spirit of "By our nation itself", which ushered in the June 15 era of reunification by turning the north-south relationship of distrust and confrontation that lasted in the Korean Peninsula over half a century into that of reconciliation and unity, is the noble patriotic spirit for bringing earlier the independent reunification, peace and prosperity.
					
					 We wish the WPK and the Korean people fresh success in their struggle to realize the country's reunification independently and peacefully by achieving the national reconciliation and unity, an urgent task in the movement for the reunification of the Korean Peninsula.

articles.title: Pak Ui Chun recibe cartas credenciales de Sarveshwar Puri
articles.content:
Pak Ui Chun recibe cartas credenciales de Sarveshwar Puri
 Pyongyang, 8 de enero (ATCC) -- Sarveshwar Puri presento el dia 8 ante el canciller coreano Pak Ui Chun sus cartas credenciales que le acreditan como representante de la Organizacion Mundial de la Salud  (OMS) en Corea.
					 Tras recibirlas el canciller departio con el.

articles.title: Continuan mitines en varias provincias
articles.content:
Continuan mitines en varias provincias 
 Pyongyang, 8 de enero (ATCC) -- Tuvieron lugar el dia 7 los mitines en las provincias de Phyong-an del Sur y del Norte, de Hwanghae del Norte y de Hamgyong del Sur en respuesta al llamamiento de los empleados del Complejo de Acero Chollima y para cumplir cabalmente las tareas combativas presentadas en el editorial conjunto publicado con motivo del Ano Nuevo por los periodicos Rodong Sinmun, Joson Inmingun y Chongnyon Jonwy.
					 En los conclaves estuvieron presentes los funcionarios directivos de las instituciones del partido, el Poder y de administracion economica y de las organizaciones de masas de respectivas localidades, trabajadores de distintos sectores, jovenes y estudiantes.
					
					 En las ocasiones se dio lectura a la carta enviada a los trabajadores de todo el pais por los empleados del citado Complejo.
					
					 Los oradores dijeron que el gran auge de hoy es un nuevo movimiento de marcha general por llevar la economia nacional a una fase de vertiginoso desarrollo con el espiritu revolucionario de los militares y la fuerza de ciencia y tecnica y expresaron la determinacion de materializar a costa de la vida las orientaciones del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y llevar a la realidad el proyecto de este de construir una potencia economica.
					
					 Exhortaron a todos a dar espuelas a la ofensiva general de hoy concordando con la marcha forzada que emprende el Dirigente Kim Jong Il para exaltar el honor de triunfadores.
					
					 Los militantes del partido y los trabajadores -concluyeron- deben Heredar las tradiciones de las generaciones heroicas que defendieron al partido y al lider y construyeron el socialismo con el gran auge de Chollima (corcel que simboliza los saltos que se dan en Corea), y registrar un gran auge revolucionario de la epoca del Songun (priorizacion militar) para construir ostentosamente la gran potencia prospera.

articles.title: ATCC critica anacronica politica de enfrentamiento de Lee Myung Bak
articles.content:
ATCC critica anacronica politica de enfrentamiento de Lee Myung Bak
Pyongyang, 8 de enero (ATCC) -- El editorial conjunto de los periodicos Rodong Sinmun, Joson Inmingun y Chongnyon Jonwy publicado con motivo del Ano Nuevo emitio advertencia a la politica de enfrentamiento fratricida de las fuerzas conservadoras surcoreanas en el "poder".
					 En menos de un ano de su mandato, Lee Myung Bak y su banda pusieron graves escollos en el movimiento nacional por la reunificacion de la patria lanzando la frenetica campana de confrontacion con la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea tras negar la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre.
					
					 Estas dos declaraciones devienen programas comunes de la nacion para la reunificacion que aclaran el principio fundamental y remedios para el desarrollo de las relaciones Norte-Sur.
					
					 En estos dias, los politicastros surcoreanos dicen que "nunca habian negado dichos documentos intercoreanos" y hablan tanto del "dialogo", porque temen la responsabilidad por la ruptura de las relaciones Norte-Sur.
					
					 Pero, son demasiado graves los crimenes de esa horda para ser excusados con unas palabras.
					
					 Despues de la aparicion del "poder" conservador de Lee en el Sur de Corea, fueron paralizadas de repente las labores de cooperacion con miras a la reconciliacion, la unidad y la reunificacion de la nacion, que marchaban vigorosamente en varios dominios como la politica, la economia, la esfera militar y la cultura, y las  relaciones Norte-Sur que se desarrollaban favorablemente. 
					
					 Se llevo a cabo la "revision total de la politica al Norte" y surgieron publicamente la teoria de "10 anos perdidos" y la del "golpe preventivo" que fija como " enemigo principal" a los connacionales.
					
					 Para colmo, los compinches de Lee se ofrecieron como "co-proponente" del "proyecto de resolucion de los derechos humanos del Norte" contra los connacionales y cometieron la locura de rechazar la exclusion de la RPDC de la lista de los "paises que apoyan el terrorismo" por parte de EE.UU.
					
					 Por culpa de ellos, las actuales relaciones Norte-Sur volvieron a la situacion antes de la aprobacion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y tropieza con graves pruebas el movimiento pannacional por la reunificacion, que ha venido avanzando bajo la bandera del ideal de "Entre nosotros, los connacionales".
					
					 La banda de Lee no podra liberarse por nada de sus enormes crimenes antinacionales. 
					
					 Ella dice que "aunque es dificil, comenzaremos correctamente para las solidas relaciones Sur-Norte", lo cual no pasa de ser un disparate descarado para evadir el castigo de la historia.
					
					 Las declaraciones arriba mencionadas devienen el fundamento del desarrollo de las relaciones Norte-Sur. Por lo tanto, sin tomar la correcta posicion y actitud en cuanto a ellas no se puede hablar ni del mas minimo desarrollo de las relaciones intercoreanas.
					
					 ?De que dialogo estara hablando la banda de Lee que tiene el alma de vibora?
					
					 Aunque se entable el "dialogo", no habra nada que conseguir porque ella misma lo habia llevado al fracaso rechazando la unidad nacional.
					
					 El "dialogo" y la "cooperacion", de que habla esa banda, resultan la premisa de la nueva campana de confrontacion anti-RPDC. Por eso, esta insistiendo ya en que la RPDC no tiene "sinceridad" en cuanto a las "conversaciones" y a la "cooperacion".
					
					 Ahora, la anacronica politica de enfrentamiento de las autoridades surcoreanas esta a punto de la bancarrota total y las fuerzas opositoras a la reunificacion estan cayendo en el atolladero sin salida.
					
					 El juego de azar politico, que hace el "poder" de Lee apostando a la nacion, es censurado y rechazado unanimemente por la nacion y la sociedad internacional.
					
					 A estas alturas, la banda de Lee trata de buscar su salida politica en la "mejora de la politica al Norte", pero esto no le sera la salvacion.
					
					 La camarilla traidora no podra liberarse por nada de su responsabilidad criminal por haber obstaculizado seriamente la reconciliacion y la unidad nacionales y la reunificacion de la patria.
					
					 La aspiracion y la demanda de la nacion coreana no pueden ser manipuladas de ninguna manera por los politiqueros que dieron espaldas a ella.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun comenta situacion convulsa del Medio Oriente
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun comenta situacion convulsa del Medio Oriente
Pyongyang, 8 de enero (ATCC) -- El ano pasado, en Irak, Afganistan, Iran, Siria, Pakistan, Palestina y otros paises de la region del Medio Oriente sucedieron muchos acontecimientos sensacionales que no puede pasar por alto la sociedad internacional debido a la intervencion profunda en dicha area de EE.UU. 
					Al respecto, el diario Rodong Sinmun divulgo este jueves un articulo individual que sigue:
					
					La situacion del Medio Oriente del ano pasado muestra que para defender la soberania del pais y la nacion y la paz regional, es imperioso preparar las fuerzas nacionales y lograr la unidad y la solidaridad entre los paises y las naciones con el fin de inhibir, aislar y debilitar a los imperialistas norteamericanos y sus satelites.
					
					Vuelve a corroborar ademas que la politica de agresion e intervencion de EE.UU. es la causa de todas las desgracias y sufrimientos y el imperialismo yanqui es el Satan.
					
					Hay que hacer mas firmes el espiritu de independencia antiimperialista y la conciencia clasista para luchar hasta el final contra las fuerzas agresoras con la indoblegable potencia espiritual.
					
					Todos los pueblos del mundo aspirantes a la independencia deben enfocar la lucha por la independencia antiimperialista y la paz en el movimiento antiyanqui y realizar todos los esfuerzos a su alcance por detener y frustrar el despotismo y la politica dominacionista de EE.UU.
					
					Triunfara sin falta la lucha de los pueblos del Medio Oriente por llevar al fracaso la agresiva estrategia de EE.UU. sobre esta area y alcanzar la paz y la estabilidad regionales.
